number.name: minute
number.script:
function onValueChanged()
local nTimeRandom = window.turns.getValue() local nodeCT = window.getDatabaseNode() local nRandom = window.randomenc.getValue() if nRandom <= 0 then DB.setValue(nodeCT, "randomenc","number",(nTimeRandom*10)); end end

buttoncontrol.name: addday
buttoncontrol.script:
function onClickDown()
local nodeCT = window.getDatabaseNode() local nRound =DB.getValue(nodeCT,"round",1) DB.setValue(nodeCT, "lastround","number",nRound) DB.setValue(nodeCT, "hour","number",(window.hourvar.getValue()+window.hour.getValue()))
end function onClickRelease()
local nVar = window.hourvar.getValue() local nTotal = nVar*360
for _,v in pairs(CombatManager.getCombatantNodes()) do
local nodeEffects = DB.getChild(v,"effects")
for _,j in pairs (DB.getChildren(nodeEffects)) do
local nDur = DB.getValue(j,"duration",0) if nDur <= 0 then elseif nDur >= nTotal then
local nDurationNew = nDur - nTotal DB.setValue(j,"duration","number",nDurationNew) elseif nDur <= nTotal then DB.deleteNode(j)
end end
end

end
